publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3186 Margaret Smith: Publication of the Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland’s Annual Report 2001-02—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland intends to lay his Annual Report for 2001-02 before the Parliament and orders the Clerk to publish the report.

S1M-3186 Margaret Smith: Publication of the Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland's Annual Report 2001-02—That the Parliament notes that the Scottish Parliamentary Ombudsman and Health Service Ombudsman for Scotland intends to lay his Annual Report for 2001-02 before the Parliament and orders the Clerk to publish the report.
